title: PayPal aiming for DeFi push after stablecoin launch – SVP Blockchain, crypto
description:
PayPal intends to continue its push into the crypto industry by integrating its newly launched stablecoin PYUSD with the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. PayPal’s senior vice president of blockchain, crypto, and digital currencies, Jose Fernandez da Ponte, said during an appearance on the Unchained Podcast that the firm wants its stablecoin to be useable for […]

The post PayPal aiming for DeFi push after stablecoin launch – SVP Blockchain, crypto appeared first on CryptoSlate.
